Class Project4

java.lang.Object
Project4
public class Project4 extends Object
EN.500.112 Gateway Computing: Java, Project 4 This class is responsible for printing out Rectangle objects of different sizes, colors, and fills onto the screen in various different patterns using the Rectangle and StdDraw classes. This program is also able to print and read Rectangle-drawing instructions to and from specified files.

  • Method Details

    • printFileAndCreateArray

      public static Rectangle[][] printFileAndCreateArray​(Scanner scan) throws IOException
      This method creates a file containing characteristics of Rectangle objects that can be printed. The method also creates an array of Rectangle objects with color and dimension specified by the client.
      Parameters:
      scan - the Scanner object that is able to read the client's input
      Returns:
      array containing the newly-created Rectangle objects
      Throws:
      IOException

    • scanFileAndCreateArray

      public static Rectangle[][] scanFileAndCreateArray​(Scanner keyboard) throws IOException
      This method scans an inputted file and creates a new array containing Rectangle objects with characteristics specified within the inputted file.
      Parameters:
      keyboard - the Scanner object that is able to read the inputted file
      Returns:
      array containing the newly-created Rectangle objects
      Throws:
      IOException

    • drawCheckerboard

      public static void drawCheckerboard​(Rectangle[][] array)
      This method draws the rectangle objects that are passed as array elements in a checkerboard pattern (row-major order).
      Parameters:
      array - the array containing the to-be-printed Rectangle objects

    • drawSnake

      public static void drawSnake​(Rectangle[][] array)
      This method draws the rectangle objects that are passed as array elements in a snake pattern.
      Parameters:
      array - the array containing the to-be-printed Rectangle objects

    • drawSpiral

      public static void drawSpiral​(Rectangle[][] array)
      This method draws the rectangle objects that are passed as array elements in a spiral pattern.
      Parameters:
      array - the array containing the to-be-printed Rectangle objects

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws IOException
      Usage method for the Project4 class. This prompts client for input and output files to print Rectangle object onto the screen and the Rectangles' characteristics onto a specified file.
      Parameters:
      args - not used
      Throws:
      IOException
